name: Front
headline: Customer communications hub for building strong relationships
description: Front powers the heart of business — the meaningful connections between teams and customers that lead to lasting relationships. Bringing email and apps together in a collaborative customer communication platform, Front drives business impact by scaling the natural conversations that create customers for life. More than 8,000 businesses are using Front today to cultivate personalized customer relationships at scale and transform their work into impact. With $204 in funding, Front is backed by leading venture capital firms including Sequoia Capital, Salesforce Ventures and Battery Ventures, as well as independent investors including top executives from PagerDuty, Atlassian, Okta, Qualtrics, and Zoom.
generated_description:
Front is more than just a software platform; it's envisioned as the central nervous system for customer communication, designed to cultivate meaningful relationships between businesses and their customers. Founded in 2013 and part of Y Combinator's Batch S14, Front has rapidly grown to support over 9,000 businesses with its collaborative communication tools, blending email and various apps into a unified platform.

The company's mission is clear: they aim to be the go-to hub for organizations looking to scale their customer relations without losing that personal touch. Their platform focuses on enhancing productivity through features like shared inboxes, AI-driven automation, and real-time collaboration, all while ensuring that teams can manage customer inquiries seamlessly across different channels—be it email, SMS, or live chat.

Based in San Francisco, Front has attracted significant venture capital, amassing $204 million in funding from heavyweights like Sequoia Capital and Salesforce Ventures. The company has a solid workforce of around 385 employees, who are dedicated to furthering its mission.

Key features of Front include:

- **Omnichannel Inboxes**: All communications in one place, making it easier for teams to track conversations regardless of the platform.
- **AI Capabilities**: Tools that provide intelligent assistance to customer service teams, ensuring faster and more accurate responses.
- **Collaboration Tools**: Enabling internal discussions and teamwork behind the scenes to enhance service quality.

Front's growth is evidenced not just by its user base but also by its high customer satisfaction ratings, including a remarkable 98% CSAT score. They cater to various industries, from technology and logistics to financial services and travel, demonstrating broad applicability.

In an age where customer experience can make or break a business, Front positions itself as a vital partner for companies eager to build lasting relationships with their customers while maximizing efficiency. You can learn more by visiting their website [Front.com](https://front.com/).
